channel.title: CVE Feed for Alordiel -- Dropdown Multisite selector
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Alordiel -- Dropdown Multisite selector

item.title: CVE-2024-29910|2024-08-06T19:16:59.916Z -- alordiel -- dropdown%20multisite%20selector
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Alordiel Dropdown Multisite selector allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Dropdown Multisite selector: from n/a through 0.9.2.
